item.title: Farshid Varno
item.description: Web Page Resume (HTML) Resume (PDF) I’m a Research Scientist with a strong technical background in HW/SW co-design and Edge AI. In summary I’m: 🧑‍🔬 A Research Scientist at Rain 🏗️ The creator of FedSim Simulator (https://fedsim.varnio.com) 💡 The first inventor of an international patent on Transfer Learning 🧐 A reviewer for top ML conferences like ECCV, CVPR, ICCV and I have:
